name: In re Nomination Petition of John CONNELLY, as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative from the 198th Legislative District. Appeal of Margaret McCall, Objector
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Connelly

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and STEVENS, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of John CONNELLY, as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative from the 198th Legislative District. Appeal of Margaret McCall, Objector.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of May, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kathleen Marie Kotula, Esq., PA Department of State, for Department of State.
City Commissioners of Philadelphia, pro se.
Andrew Theo Neuwirth, Esq., Neuwirth Law Office, LLC, West Conshohocken, for Margaret McCall.
Daniel Conner, Esq., Philadelphia, for John Connelly.
casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 1230
In re Nomination Petition of John CONNELLY, as Candidate for the Democratic Nomination for Representative from the 198th Legislative District. Appeal of Margaret McCall, Objector.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted on Briefs April 29, 2014.
Decided May 4, 2014.
Kathleen Marie Kotula, Esq., PA Department of State, for Department of State.
City Commissioners of Philadelphia, pro se.
Andrew Theo Neuwirth, Esq., Neuwirth Law Office, LLC, West Conshohocken, for Margaret McCall.
Daniel Conner, Esq., Philadelphia, for John Connelly.
BEFORE: CASTILLE C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and STEVENS, JJ.
